content.question: Which of the following is a correct expression for the net force, in newtons, exerted on the object as a function of time?

choices.label: <math alttext="negative 6 e raised to the negative 3 t power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="negative 3 e raised to the negative 3 t power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="e raised to the negative 3 t power " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 e raised to the negative 3 t power " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 2 over 3 times, open parenthesis 1 minus e raised to the negative 3 t power, close parenthesis, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="negative 3 e raised to the negative 3 t power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
